column4: Hmmm, according to this link we are both right ... http://www.ubuntu.com/community/ubuntustory/components
Hmmm, I'm sure getting sick of doing /say usrname message and having it show up on the main chat. Grrr!! I'm sober, so WTH is it with me?
also note, however, that as an unregistered user, you can't query on freenode.
